root: ^I ask %FullName:NPC:1% if %Pron:1:1% wants to go out but %Pron:1:1% tells me %Pron:1:1% is going out with %FullName:NPC:1%.
^"Yeah, I know. I meant all of us go out and do something."

res1: ^Now, I have plans with the two of them and I am the third wheel.

^Both %FullName:NPC:1% and %FullName:NPC:2% have a great time with me and say we should do this more often but this was a nightmare for me! I wanted to go out on a date with %FullName:NPC:1% because I like %Pron:1:2%, I didn't want to see %Pron:1:2% up close spending time with %Pron:1:2% significant other!
res2: ^%FullName:NPC:1% is forgiving but %FullName:NPC:2% gets mad at me for this.

^%FullName:NPC:2% is mad at me even though I didn't know the two of them were dating! %Pron:2:1% even tells a bunch of other kids in school so that more people will think I'm a jerk. %FullName:NPC:1% didn't mind though and now I can tell %Pron:1:1% feels bad for me. Just what I need, right?
res3: ^%FullName:NPC:1% laughs at this and no one else ever finds out about this.

^%FullName:NPC:1% says I am really funny. Great, just what I want to be. The funny friend. At least no one else ever found out. This was quick thinking by me. But I'm still embarrassed about this myself.
